summary: A comprehensive suite of unit and integration tests for Django's admin interface, covering actions, custom querysets, template overrides, documentation, inline handling, JavaScript/CSS behavior, URL generation, search, messaging, CRUD operations, permissions, custom primary keys, Unicode handling, caching, prepopulated fields, readonly fields, saveâ€‘as functionality, security decorators, ETag handling, generic relations, and other admin view features.
business_intent: Validate and safeguard the correctness, stability, and user experience of the Django admin site by automatically testing a wide range of admin functionalities and edge cases, thereby preventing regressions and ensuring compliance with expected behavior.
